com.cisco.nesal.plugin

Class DefaultPlatformDependent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cisco.nesal.plugin.DefaultPlatformDependent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPlatformDependent

    public class DefaultPlatformDependent
extends Object
implements IPlatformDependent
    This class provides the default reference implementation for IPlatformDependent interface. Software product can use this class as example when customizing its own implementation.

    • Method Detail

      • getSoftwareID

        public String getSoftwareID()
        Description copied from interface: IPlatformDependent
        Gets the software product name and version. This will be sent back to the licensing cloud to help identify this software product
        Specified by:
        getSoftwareID in interface IPlatformDependent
        Returns:
        The Software tag name.

      • getTrustedStorePath

        public String getTrustedStorePath()
        Description copied from interface: IPlatformDependent
        Gets the path to the trusted storage directory.

        The Agent will use this path to write out data that needs to be protected. The customer should not have access to this area. This will be called during init method.

        As of version 1.0 the Agent will write two certificates and some other persistence data. Three files will be created and will use approximately 6k of space.

        Specified by:
        getTrustedStorePath in interface IPlatformDependent
        Returns:
        The path to the trusted storage directory.

      • getUDI

        public UDI getUDI()
        Description copied from interface: IPlatformDependent
        Gets the UDI of this device.

        Calls the PD code to get the UDI of this device. This will be called during system boot and periodically at run time.

        Example: if the UDI consists of the PID and SN then the implementation will fill the pid and sn members of the returnUDI object. All other members will be set to null.

        Specified by:
        getUDI in interface IPlatformDependent
        Returns:
        The UDI of this device.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Description copied from interface: IPlatformDependent
        Shuts down the object..

        This is the last call made to the software product library. It will be called if the agent is shutdown gracefully.

        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface IPlatformDependent
